docs.lead_paragraph: After a television report that players drank in the dugout during games, the beleaguered Red Sox issued a defiant statement.
docs.snippet: After a television report that players drank in the dugout during games, the beleaguered Red Sox issued a defiant statement....

headline.print_headline: Red Sox Deny They Drank in Dugout

docs.lead_paragraph: The Red Sox late Tuesday issued a statement denying news media reports that Boston players were drinking beer in the dugout during games this season.
docs.abstract: Boston Red Sox deny news media reports that players drank beer in dugout during games this season.
docs.snippet: The Red Sox late Tuesday issued a statement denying news media reports that Boston players were drinking beer in the dugout during games this season....

docs.lead_paragraph: Red Sox management met with Manager Terry Francona on Friday to discuss his future, but General Manager Theo Epstein said no decision would be made or announced on Friday.
docs.abstract: The Red Sox said no decision on Terry Francona's future as manager would be made Friday.
docs.snippet: The Red Sox said no decision on Terry Francona's future as manager would be made Friday....

headline.main: Red Sox: No Decision Yet on Francona's Future

docs.lead_paragraph: CLEVELAND – Daisuke Matsuzaka had done his usual flirtation with the strike zone (96 pitches, 54 strikes), and it was time for a relief pitcher in the sixth inning at Progressive Field on Wednesday night. Terry Francona, the manager of the Boston Red Sox, looked at the Cleveland Indians’ lineup and chose Dennys Reyes, figuring Reyes could stay in for a while against a left-leaning order.
docs.abstract: The Red Sox are 0-5 after a strange play leads to a game-breaking homer for the Indians on Wednesday.
docs.snippet: The Red Sox are 0-5 after a strange play leads to a game-breaking homer for the Indians on Wednesday....

headline.main: At 0-5, the Red Sox Are Scrambling

docs.lead_paragraph: Liverpool has agreed to the sale of the club to New England Sports Ventures, which owns the Boston Red Sox, Liverpool said.

headline.seo: Red Sox Owners Agree to Purchase Liverpool
headline.main: Owners of Red Sox to Buy Liverpool Soccer Club
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Owners Agree to Buy Liverpool but Face a Fight

byline.contributor: Julia Werdigier in London and Chris V. Nicholson in Paris contributed reporting.

docs.lead_paragraph: Responding to news he tested positive for performance-enhancing drugs in 2003, the Red Sox’ David Ortiz admitted to carelessly taking vitamins and supplements but denied using steroids.

docs.lead_paragraph: Manny Ramírez said Sunday that he would agree to be traded if the deal was beneficial for him and the Red Sox, but he also added that the team would not dare trade him.
